card.name: Acidic Slime
card.text: Deathtouch When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Adaptive Automaton
card.text: As Adaptive Automaton enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types. Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

card.name: Aegis Angel
card.text: Flying When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel.

card.name: AEther Adept
card.text: When AEther Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Alabaster Mage
card.text: {1}{W}: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Alluring Siren
card.text: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.

card.name: Angelic Destiny
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and first strike, and is an Angel in addition to its other types. When enchanted creature dies, return Angelic Destiny to its owner's hand.

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Angel's Mercy
card.text: You gain 7 life.

card.name: Arachnus Spinner
card.text: Reach Tap an untapped Spider you control: Search your graveyard and/or library for a card named Arachnus Web and put it onto the battlefield attached to target creature. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Arachnus Web
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

card.name: Arbalest Elite
card.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Arbalest Elite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Arbalest Elite doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Archon of Justice
card.text: Flying When Archon of Justice dies, exile target permanent.

card.name: Auramancer
card.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Autumn's Veil
card.text: Spells you control can't be countered by blue or black spells this turn, and creatures you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells this turn.

card.name: Azure Mage
card.text: {3}{U}: Draw a card.

card.name: Belltower Sphinx
card.text: Flying Whenever a source deals damage to Belltower Sphinx, that source's controller puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Benalish Veteran
card.text: Whenever Benalish Veteran attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Blood Ogre
card.text: Bloodthirst 1 First strike

card.name: Blood Seeker
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.

card.name: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth
card.text: Bloodthirst 3 Flying Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.

card.name: Bloodrage Vampire
card.text: Bloodthirst 1

card.name: Bountiful Harvest
card.text: You gain 1 life for each land you control.

card.name: Brindle Boar
card.text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.

card.name: Brink of Disaster
card.text: Enchant creature or land When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.

card.name: Buried Ruin
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Call to the Grave
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature. At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

card.name: Cancel
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Carnage Wurm
card.text: Bloodthirst 3 Trample

card.name: Celestial Purge
card.text: Exile target black or red permanent.

card.name: Cemetery Reaper
card.text: Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Chandra, the Firebrand
card.text: +1: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 1 damage to target creature or player. -2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. -6: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 6 damage to each of up to six target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
card.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Chandra's Phoenix
card.text: Flying Haste Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Chasm Drake
card.text: Flying Whenever Chasm Drake attacks, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Circle of Flame
card.text: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.

card.name: Combust
card.text: Combust can't be countered by spells or abilities. Combust deals 5 damage to target white or blue creature. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Consume Spirit
card.text: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.

card.name: Crimson Mage
card.text: {R}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Crown of Empires
card.text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature. Gain control of that creature instead if you control artifacts named Scepter of Empires and Throne of Empires.

card.name: Crumbling Colossus
card.text: Trample When Crumbling Colossus attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

card.name: Cudgel Troll
card.text: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll.

card.name: Dark Favor
card.text: Enchant creature When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

card.name: Day of Judgment
card.text: Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Deathmark
card.text: Destroy target green or white creature.

card.name: Demon's Horn
card.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Demystify
card.text: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Devouring Swarm
card.text: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Devouring Swarm gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Disentomb
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Distress
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Divination
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Divine Favor
card.text: Enchant creature When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

card.name: Djinn of Wishes
card.text: Flying Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Doubling Chant
card.text: For each creature you control, you may search your library for a creature card with the same name as that creature. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Dragon's Claw
card.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Dragonskull Summit
card.text: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Drifting Shade
card.text: Flying {B}: Drifting Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Drowned Catacomb
card.text: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Druidic Satchel
card.text: {2}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. If it's a land card, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Dungrove Elder
card.text: Hexproof Dungrove Elder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.

card.name: Duskhunter Bat
card.text: Bloodthirst 1 Flying

card.name: Elixir of Immortality
card.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

card.name: Elvish Archdruid
card.text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Elf you control.

card.name: Fiery Hellhound
card.text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Fireball
card.text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players. Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

card.name: Firebreathing
card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Flameblast Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Flashfreeze
card.text: Counter target red or green spell.

card.name: Flight
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

card.name: Fling
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

card.name: Fog
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Frost Breath
card.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Frost Titan
card.text: Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}. Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.text: Bloodthirst 6 Flying

card.name: Garruk, Primal Hunter
card.text: +1: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. -3: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. -6: Put a 6/6 green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control.

card.name: Garruk's Horde
card.text: Trample Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast the top card of your library if it's a creature card.

card.name: Gideon Jura
card.text: +2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. -2: Destroy target tapped creature. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

card.name: Goblin Bangchuckers

card.name: Goblin Fireslinger

card.name: Jace, Memory Adept
card.text: +1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. 0: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. -7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

card.text: {U}, {T}: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

card.name: Jace's Erasure
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player put the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Plummet
card.text: Destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Ponder
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

card.text: Defender Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Primeval Titan
card.text: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Primordial Hydra
card.text: Primordial Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Primordial Hydra. Primordial Hydra has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

card.text: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Scepter of Empires

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

card.name: Shock
card.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Skinshifter

card.name: Skywinder Drake

card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
